articles.content: The fastest living woman! The commentator would boom just as Jamaicas Shericka Jackson blurred along the track, arms pumping, knees kicking, to an incredible time of 21:45 to take gold at the World A… [+8549 chars]

articles.title: Miami Marlins at Pittsburgh Pirates 7/22/22 - MLB Picks & Predictions - Free Picks
articles.description: In Friday night MLB action, the Miami Marlins will travel to PNC Park to take on the Pittsburgh Pirates. The Marlins (43-49) are looking to snap a four-game losing streak and have managed just one run during that stretch.
